description: AI-powered email campaigns with personalization, timing optimization, and behavioral triggers

test_cases.name: Email Automation Page Load
test_cases.description: Verify the email automation page loads correctly with all components
steps: Verify tabs are displayed (Templates, Campaigns, Analytics)
Verify 'Create Sample Templates' button is present
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads with all components visible and functional

test_cases.name: Email Templates Display
test_cases.description: Verify email templates are displayed with correct information
steps: Verify each template shows name and subject
Verify template validation status is shown
Verify template actions (Preview, Edit, Delete) are available
test_cases.expected_result: All email templates display with complete information

test_cases.name: Template Creation Form
test_cases.description: Test creating a new email template
steps: Verify template creation modal is displayed
Enter template body with HTML and variables
Verify new template is created and appears in the list
test_cases.expected_result: Template creation form works correctly and creates new templates

test_cases.name: Template Editing
test_cases.description: Test editing an existing email template
steps: Click Edit button on a template
Verify edit modal opens with pre-filled data
Verify template is updated in the list
test_cases.expected_result: Template editing works correctly and updates existing templates

test_cases.name: Template Preview
steps: Click Preview button on a template
Verify preview shows personalized subject and body
Verify variables are replaced with actual data
test_cases.expected_result: Template preview works correctly and shows personalized content

test_cases.name: Template Validation
steps: Create a template with valid variables
Create a template with invalid variables
Verify total variables count is displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Template validation works correctly and shows appropriate status

test_cases.name: Email Campaigns Display
test_cases.description: Verify email campaigns are displayed with correct information
steps: Verify each campaign shows name, template, target, status, and created date
test_cases.expected_result: All email campaigns display with complete information

test_cases.name: Campaign Creation Form
test_cases.description: Test creating a new email campaign
steps: Verify campaign creation modal is displayed
Verify new campaign is created and appears in the list
test_cases.expected_result: Campaign creation form works correctly and creates new campaigns

test_cases.name: Campaign Sending
test_cases.expected_result: Campaign sending works correctly and updates status

test_cases.name: Email Analytics Display
test_cases.description: Verify email analytics are displayed correctly
steps: Verify total sent count is shown
Verify open rate percentage is shown
Verify recent email logs table is displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Email analytics display correctly with all metrics

test_cases.name: Tab Navigation
test_cases.expected_result: Tab navigation works correctly and shows appropriate content

test_cases.name: Sample Templates Creation
steps: Verify new sample templates appear in the list

test_cases.name: Template Deletion
steps: Click Delete button on a template
Verify template is removed from the list
test_cases.expected_result: Template deletion works correctly with confirmation

test_cases.name: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify graceful handling when API fails or data is missing
steps: Simulate API failure (network error or 500 response)
Verify page remains functional after error
Verify retry mechanism works if available
Verify empty state is handled gracefully
test_cases.expected_result: Page handles API failures gracefully with proper error display

test_cases.name: Responsive Design
test_cases.description: Verify email automation page is responsive on different screen sizes
steps: Verify all content is visible and properly laid out
Verify content is accessible and readable
Verify modals adapt to smaller screens
test_cases.expected_result: Page is responsive and functional on all screen sizes
